channel.title: What do you believe is wrong with the world? (Help me with my book.)
channel.description:
Hey Moparscape community, recently I've been working on a book that I've put quite some time into so far. It's come along great so far, with 43 full pages already completed (no images.) However, I want some input from you guys, as I know the Moparscape community is full of great minds, and a lot of intelligent people. A quick few sentences on my book:
It's a book that goes through the past few decades of our society and world and show how it has slowly degraded. I've spent the past two years studying sociology and critical theory lately, along with looking at patterns that society has followed. I've come to the light on realizing what society has become, and how un-intelligent some are. I'll cover many things in this book, including a well explanation on how life is meaningless (this is not some dramatic, sad, depressing thought.) It covers religion and how it has held back our scientific progressions. And many other problems in the world, including a few chapters dedicated to social media sites on the internet (Facebook, Twitter, etc.)
What I'm asking from the Moparscape community is a list of what they believe is wrong with the world. I know there will be some debating going on here, which is fine, as long as no flaming or disrespect occurs. It can be a simple list, as short or as long as you would like. Or you can go more in-depth and explain why you believe some of those things are wrong in the world.
Thanks to those who decide to contribute. Any recommendations that I use in my book will be thanked for, as I'll have a few pages of thanks to those who have helped contributed. I will not add your name unless you want me to (just say before your list if you'd like me to; it can be your real name or Moparscape username.)
[b]The books title is set to be, [u][i]Degradation of The World[/i][/u].[/b]

item.title: What do you believe is wrong with the world? (Help me with my book.)
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Krackkid, post:9, topic:480384”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=598619.msg4210172#msg4210172 date=1359419836]

Honestly how parents are raising their kids.

How so?
[/quote]Giving their kids what they want whenever, also do I need to mention honey boo boo?[/quote]
I’m not from America, if it wasn’t for south park I would’ve had no idea what that was lol. I’m not stating any opinion on the topic, I just wanted your reasoning behind your opinion o.o.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you believe is wrong with the world? (Help me with my book.)

item.title: What do you believe is wrong with the world? (Help me with my book.)
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I’d prob say it’s more for the debates because some of the worst things in the world can also be thought of as good things and vice versa i.e. the human race.
It can be thought of as a disease or it can be thought of as something good (nothings coming to mind atm for some reason but I’m sure theirs lots of examples lmao…).
No thanks, that’s too vague for my liking.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you believe is wrong with the world? (Help me with my book.)

item.title: What do you believe is wrong with the world? (Help me with my book.)
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:4, topic:480384”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=598619.msg4209827#msg4209827 date=1359385497]
CapitalismSocialism, communism and imperialism are the problems in the world.
[/quote]Fix’d[/quote]

Lol’d at this.

Bowser jr:

[quote]I want some input from you guys, as I know the Moparscape community is full of great minds, and a lot of intelligent people.

Stop trolling.

Capitalism and Imperialism is the problems in the world.[/quote]

are* the problems in the world.
Not sure how it seems as if I’m trolling.

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:2, topic:480384”]This is probably in the wrong sub-forum.

Be more specific on what you want, their are a bajillion things wrong with the world…[/quote]

I wasn’t sure of what sub forum to put it in, this seems like a general question. And yes, I know there are a ‘bajillion’ things wrong with the world, tell me some?

Read full topic
item.source: What do you believe is wrong with the world? (Help me with my book.)
